item.title: 印度证券交易委员会放宽全球基金购买主权债券的规定
item.description: 印度证券市场监管机构周三放宽了外国基金投资地方政府债券的某些规定，以增加追踪全球债券指数的基金的参与。【原文：India’s securities market regulator on Wednesday relaxed certain rules for foreign funds investing in local government bonds, to increase participation from funds tracking global bond indexes.】

item.title: 在初创公司与 Meta 达成交易后，OpenAI 将逐步停止规模人工智能工作
item.description: OpenAI 正在逐步停止与数据标签初创公司 Scale AI 的合作，在 Meta Platforms 公司向其投资数十亿美元并聘用其创始人几天后，OpenAI 就切断了与该公司的联系。【原文：OpenAI is phasing out the work it does with data-labeling startup Scale AI, cutting ties with the company days after Meta Platforms Inc. invested billions of dollars in it and hired its founder.】

item.title: 最高法院支持德克萨斯州的临时核废料储存地
item.description: 美国最高法院维持一项联邦计划不变，即在得克萨斯州西部的一个临时地点储存多达 4 万吨的高放射性废料。【原文：The US Supreme Court left intact a federal plan to store as much as 40,000 tons of highly radioactive waste at a temporary west Texas site.】

item.title: 特朗普挤压委内瑞拉，化肥厂将失去许可证
item.description: 委内瑞拉最有价值的海外资产之一将失去在哥伦比亚的经营许可，这是美国对尼古拉斯-马杜罗政权财政状况打击的一部分。【原文：One of Venezuela’s most valuable overseas assets is set to lose its license to operate in Colombia as part of a US attack on the finances of the Nicolas Maduro regime.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 接近与包括阿波罗在内的贷款人达成破产协议
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，陷入困境的芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 公司将由包括阿波罗全球管理公司在内的债权人接管，根据该计划，该公司破产的时间将足以削减数十亿美元的债务。【原文：Struggling chipmaker Wolfspeed Inc. will be taken over by creditors including Apollo Global Management Inc. under a proposal that would put it into bankruptcy just long enough to slash billions in debt, according to people familiar with the plan.】

item.title: 空中客车公司在航展上获得大量订单，而波音公司却选择置身事外
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）在本届巴黎航展上获得了更多先进的 A350 机型订单，一举成为本届航展的最大赢家，而多年来的竞争对手波音公司（Boeing Co.【原文：Airbus SE wrapped up the Paris Air Show with more orders for its advanced A350 model, making a clean sweep at the event after perennial rival Boeing Co. chose to postpone any announcements following a fatal crash a few days before the expo.】

item.title: 政策作者称英国富人遗产税激增是个错误
item.description: 英国工党政府打击富人旗舰计划的设计者之一表示，让非英国籍人士立即对其海外资产征收 40% 的遗产税是一个 "错误"。【原文：One of the architects of the UK Labour government’s flagship crackdown on the wealthy said it was a “mistake” to expose non-doms to an immediate 40% inheritance tax on their overseas assets.】

item.title: 投资者等待美联储利率决定，美国股市上涨
item.description: 美国股市周三上涨，投资者期待美联储的货币政策决定。【原文：US stocks gained on Wednesday with investors looking ahead to the Federal Reserve’s monetary policy decision.】

item.title: 英特尔引入新工程领导人，助力人工智能卷土重来
item.description: 英特尔公司任命了新的工程领导层，作为首席执行官陈立武领导下的扭亏为盈工作的一部分，并启用了 Cadence Design Systems 公司、苹果公司和谷歌公司的资深人士。【原文：Intel Corp. named new engineering leadership as part of a turnaround effort under Chief Executive Officer Lip-Bu Tan, tapping veterans of Cadence Design Systems Inc., Apple Inc. and Google.】

item.title: 津巴布韦要求南非支持二十国集团债务改革
item.description: 津巴布韦已请求南非帮助争取支持，以便在 20 国集团共同框架下对其债务进行重整，这一步骤可能使津巴布韦在 25 年多来首次恢复进入国际资本市场的机会。【原文：Zimbabwe has asked South Africa to help garner support for its debt to be revamped under the Group of 20’s Common Framework, a step that could restore its access to international capital markets for the first time in more than 25 years.】

item.title: 伊朗-以色列袭击事件后中东地区船舶保险费用飙升
item.description: 由于伊朗和以色列之间的袭击增加了该地区船只的风险，在波斯湾航行的船只的保险费用也随之飙升。【原文：The cost of insurance for ships sailing in the Persian Gulf jumped as attacks between Iran and Israel raised risks for vessels in the area.】

item.title: 新日铁完成对美国钢铁公司 141 亿美元的收购
item.description: 新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.）在周三的一份声明中表示，该公司完成了对美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.）价值 141 亿美元的收购，结束了历时 18 个月的美日钢铁企业合并努力。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. closed its $14.1 billion takeover of United States Steel Corp., bringing to an end an 18-month effort to combine the American and Japanese steelmakers, the companies said in a Wednesday statement.】

item.title: Xreal 的 One Pro 是真正 AR 智能眼镜的过渡产品
item.description:
评论：该公司最新推出的增强现实眼镜可作为手机、PC 和游戏设备的外接显示器。【原文：

Review: The company’s latest augmented-reality glasses excel as an external display for phones, PCs and gaming devices.

】

item.title: 腾讯支持的 MiniMax 发布人工智能工具，以对抗 Manus
item.description: 中国后起之秀 MiniMax 计划推出两款人工智能产品，可自动代表用户执行任务，从而在代理人工智能领域与 OpenAI 和 Manus 等公司一较高下。【原文：Chinese upstart MiniMax is slated to roll out a pair of AI products that autonomously perform tasks on behalf of users, upping its game in the realm of agentic AI against the likes of OpenAI and Manus.】

item.title: 德州仪器公司计划在美国投资 600 亿美元
item.description: 美国德州仪器公司（Texas Instruments Inc.【原文：Texas Instruments Inc. touted plans to spend more than $60 billion on semiconductor plants in the US, making it the latest chipmaker to promote its domestic manufacturing ambitions as the Trump administration urges investments and threatens to upend the sector with tariffs.】

item.title: 美国东北部遭遇创纪录高温，纽约将热浪滚滚
item.description: 纽约市和美国东北部地区在经历了数周的阴雨天气后，将转入炙热的高温天气，气温将破纪录。【原文：New York City and the US Northeast will shift to searing heat after weeks of rain and clouds as record-breaking temperatures descend on the region.】

item.title: 纽约梅隆银行和标准银行将提供尼日利亚奈拉债务融资服务
item.description: 纽约梅隆银行（Bank of New York Mellon Corp）将出售由尼日利亚本币主权债务支持的全球存托票据，为投资者提供获得非洲人口最多的经济体所提供的高收益的机会。【原文：Bank of New York Mellon Corp. will sell global depositary notes backed by local-currency Nigerian sovereign debt, offering investors access to the high yields offered by Africa’s most populous economy.】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数稳定在今年最高水平附近
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数上周有所下降，稳定在八个月来的最高水平附近。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits ticked down last week, stabilizing near the highest levels in eight months.】

item.title: 新房建设降至五年来最低点
item.description: 由于待售房屋库存增加和抵押贷款利率居高不下，削弱了建造房屋的动力，5 月份美国住宅新开工量出现下降，创下自大流行病爆发以来的最慢速度。【原文：New US residential construction declined in May to the slowest pace since the onset of the pandemic as an elevated inventory of homes for sale and high mortgage rates sapped the motivation to build.】

item.title: Pimco 和 King Street 的 AmSurg 意外收获为丑陋的不良债务传奇画上句号
item.description: 曾经隶属于 KKR & Co.-backed Envision Healthcare Corp.的门诊手术公司 AmSurg 的出售，为这一史诗般的不良债务传奇划上了句号。【原文：The sale of AmSurg, an ambulatory surgery company once part of KKR & Co.-backed Envision Healthcare Corp., caps an epic distressed-debt saga that will hand a windfall to investors that took ownership of the business after an ugly debt brawl.】

item.title: 通往 3.7 万亿美元稳定币市场之路充满障碍
item.description: 美国参议院通过稳定币立法，标志着一比一追踪美元的加密货币可能成为主流货币，这是一个巨大的飞跃。【原文：The passage of stablecoin legislation in the US Senate marks a huge leap forward for the potential mainstreaming of cryptocurrencies that track the US dollar one-to-one.】

item.title: 欧洲央行发现欧元区仍受制于抵押贷款利率上升
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的研究显示，由于过去的利率上调继续传导至抵押贷款，欧元区的家庭消费在一段时间内仍将受到抑制。【原文：Household consumption in the euro area will remain restrained for some time as past interest-rate hikes continue to feed through to mortgages, according to research by the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 软银支持的初创公司未达财务目标，裁员
item.description: 就在几年前，Spotter Inc. 还是 YouTube 名人业务蓬勃发展过程中最有价值的初创公司之一。该公司为社交媒体上的明星提供了一种新的融资方式，向野兽先生（MrBeast）和完美督爷（Dude Perfect）等创作者提供了数百万美元，以换取他们视频收入的分成。【原文：Just a couple years ago, Spotter Inc. was one of the most valuable startups in the booming business of YouTube celebrity. The company, which boasted a new way for social media stars to fund their operations, fronted millions of dollars to creators like MrBeast and Dude Perfect in exchange for a share of the revenue their videos generated.】

item.title: 比特币期权显示交易者在对冲跌至 100,000 美元的风险
item.description: 比特币期权显示，随着全球金融市场地缘政治和经济不确定性的上升，交易者正在对冲价格回落至100,000美元价位的风险。【原文：Bitcoin options show traders are hedging against a price pullback to the $100,000 price level with geopolitical and economic uncertainty rising across global financial markets.】

item.title: 关税期限临近，南非与美国将重启贸易谈判
item.description: 南非将在下周举行的美非商业峰会期间恢复与特朗普政府的贸易谈判，而此时距离华盛顿的对等关税生效还有不到一个月的时间。【原文：South Africa will resume trade talks with the Trump administration on the sidelines of the US-Africa Business Summit next week, with less than a month to go before Washington’s reciprocal tariffs are set to come into effect.】

item.title: 意大利布雷博为美国自行车品牌 Specialized 提供制动器
item.description: 知情人士透露，布雷博公司将为美国自行车品牌 Specialized 提供制动系统，这是两家公司正在建立的合作伙伴关系的一部分。【原文：Brembo NV will supply a braking system for US bicycle brand Specialized as part of a partnership the two companies are setting up, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 博通 340% 的涨幅让华尔街争论它是否是 "华丽七巧板 "的材料
item.description: 两年多来，关于最大、最重要的科技公司的讨论一直围绕着同七只股票。现在，华尔街的一些人认为，博通公司（Broadcom Inc.【原文：For more than two years, conversations about the biggest, most important technology companies have revolved around the same seven stocks. Now, some on Wall Street are making the case that Broadcom Inc. should be part of that discussion.】

item.description:

item.title: 随着税收上调，英国房价出现 2021 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 政府数据显示，由于税收增加导致部分购房者退出市场，英国 4 月份房价创下 2021 年以来最大跌幅。【原文：UK home prices fell in April by most since 2021, government data show, as a tax increase drove some buyers out of the market.】
